data.name: CamGirls: Sophie X Rias
data.detailed_description:
Follow Sophie as she embarks on her latest adventure in making money, working alongside the enigmatic Rias as they put on a special camgirl show for their viewers. Your decisions in this short Yuri/Lesbian story will determine how successful the show is and whether Sophie finds a new source of funds to live off, or must resort to drastic measures to keep going!

  • A Visual Novel Game with Multiple Choices
  • Alternate Endings based on your Choices
  • Adult content and sex scenes to explore
  • Fun comedic moments to enjoy
  • A special bonus epilogue to uncover!

* All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.

data.short_description: Follow Sophie as she embarks on her latest adventure in making money, working alongside the enigmatic Rias as they put on a special yuri/lesbian camgirl show for their viewers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, including the following: Nudity & Sexual interactions between women.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.
